alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 6:00PM CDT until September 23 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hume, or 7 miles east of Pleasanton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Hume, Amoret, Foster and Worland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
